resources.string: Is this an Update, Urgent or new Post?
Event Name: eg: saving turtles, planting trees
tap for title, or hold for event
Just after brief overview and process you will be on your way to creating your own custom page for your organization

Help tackle projects that need specialized skills by connecting your organization with professionals who want to make a difeerence. \nGain global support for unplanned events for long and short term goals to help you achieve your overall mission. \nProvide a way to connect with local communities and visitors about realtime events and ways to get involved.

Complete your base profile then update your profile for review. Once approved, you will receive a survey by email following by welcome kit. You can start using the app right of way. Start adding your campaigns!
Let\'s set up the account! You\'ll need to fill out an initial form, upload your credentials, and set up the profile on following screens
Now that you know how we can help your organization with individual contributors. Thats why we re here. Lets keep it brief.
